resources.string: If you already have it, input the INR value provided by your doctor. (This value could be set when the control day comes)
Remember to take your dose today: {0} {1}
Today is control day. Remember to write down the INR value provided by your doctor.
Looks like you don\'t have a configured treatment yet.\n\nPress the button below and configure it as soon as possible.
There is no data available for the moment.\n\nPlease, come back when you have done your first control.
